title: [Big Melbourne]
creator_credit: Malcolm Wallhead and State Film Centre of Victoria
brief_description: Possible State Film Centre production. Shows a woman and her son on a journey through Melbourne’s central business district, including Flinders Street train station, St Paul’s Cathedral, shopping at Myer. Also features footage of ships and boats.
